problems_identified.root_cause: Parent module only exporting state accessor functions
problems_identified.impact: All functionality tests pass but function count test fails

solution_implemented.approach: Parent module must explicitly re-export all nested module functions
solution_implemented.change: Added all 44 functions from nested modules to Export-ModuleMember
solution_implemented.reason: NestedModules load into parent context but don't auto-export to consumers

learnings_documented.topic: PowerShell Nested Module Function Export Requirements
learnings_documented.key_insight: Parent module must explicitly re-export functions from nested modules

todos_completed: Investigate why 0 functions are being exported from the modular module
Check the parent module's Export-ModuleMember statement
Verify nested modules are properly loading and exporting their functions
Fix function export issue to pass all 9 tests

testing_readiness.expected_outcome: All 9 tests should pass with 44+ functions exported

recommendation: TEST - Run Test-Week6-Modular.ps1 to validate complete fix
